full_text:
Case 22-1426, Document 3-2, 07/08/2022, 3344434, Page21 of 92

| Date       | Document Number | Description                                                                                                                                                           |
|------------|-----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 12/31/2020 | 107             | LETTER MOTION addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated December 31, 2020 re: Extension of Time. Document filed by Ghislaine Maxwell.       |
| 01/05/2021 | 108             | MEMO ENDORSEMENT as to Ghislaine Maxwell (1) on 107 LETTER MOTION addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated December 31, 2020 re: Extension of Time. ENDORSEMENT: SO ORDERED. |
| 01/05/2021 |                 | Set/Reset Deadlines as to Ghislaine Maxwell: Motions due by 1/25/2021. Responses due by 2/26/2021. Replies due by 3/5/2021.                                        |
| 01/08/2021 | 109             | LETTER MOTION addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated January 8, 2021 re: Extension of Time to File Notice of Appeal. Document filed by Ghislaine Maxwell. |
| 01/11/2021 | 110             | SEALED DOCUMENT placed in vault.                                                                                                                                      |
| 01/11/2021 | 111             | SEALED DOCUMENT placed in vault.                                                                                                                                      |
| 01/11/2021 | 112             | MEMO ENDORSEMENT as to Ghislaine Maxwell (1) denying 109 LETTER MOTION addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated January 8, 2021 re: Extension of Time to File Notice of Appeal. ENDORSEMENT: The request is denied. Good cause for an extension of time to file a notice of appeal has not been provided. SO ORDERED. |
| 01/11/2021 | 113             | NOTICE OF APPEAL by Ghislaine Maxwell from 104 Order.                                                                                                                 |
| 01/11/2021 |                 | Appeal Remark as to re: 113 Notice of Appeal by Ghislaine Maxwell. $505.00 Appeal filing fee due.                                                                     |
| 01/12/2021 |                 | Transmission of Notice of Appeal and Certified Copy of Docket Sheet as to Ghislaine Maxwell to US Court of Appeals re: 113 Notice of Appeal.                         |
| 01/12/2021 |                 | Appeal Record Sent to USCA (Electronic File). Certified Indexed record on Appeal Electronic Files as to Ghislaine Maxwell re: 113 Notice of Appeal were transmitted to the U.S. Court of Appeals. |
| 01/13/2021 | 114             | INTERNET CITATION NOTE as to Ghislaine Maxwell: Material from decision with Internet citation re: 106 Memorandum & Opinion.                                          |
| 01/14/2021 | 115             | LETTER by Ghislaine Maxwell addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated January 14, 2021 re: Laptop Access                                   |
| 01/15/2021 | 116             | MEMO ENDORSEMENT as to Ghislaine Maxwell on 115 LETTER by Ghislaine Maxwell addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated January 14, 2021 re: Laptop Access. ENDORSEMENT: The unobjected-to request is GRANTED. The Bureau of Prisons is ORDERED to give the Defendant access to the laptop computer on weekends and holidays during the hours that she is permitted to review discovery. SO ORDERED. |
| 01/15/2021 |                 | USCA Case Number 21-0058 from the U.S. Court of Appeals, 2nd Circ. as to Ghislaine Maxwell, assigned to 113 Notice of Appeal filed by Ghislaine Maxwell.              |
| 01/15/2021 |                 | USCA Appeal Fees received $ 505.00, receipt number 465401271727 as to Ghislaine Maxwell on 1/15/2021 re: 113 Notice of Appeal filed by Ghislaine Maxwell.              |
| 01/25/2021 | 117             | ORDER as to Ghislaine Maxwell: On January 25, 2021, the Court received by email the attached letter from the Bureau of Prisons ("BOP"). In the letter, the BOP requests that the Court vacate its January 15, 2021 Order, Dkt. No. 116, which directed the BOP to give the Defendant access to her Government provided laptop computer on weekends and holidays during the hours that she is permitted to review discovery. The Defendant and the Government may respond to the BOP's letter within one week of |

DOJ-OGR-00020507

text_blocks.content: The table containing court documents and their descriptions

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court docket sheet with various entries related to Ghislaine Maxwell's case. The document is well-formatted and legible.
